Type.Name: MoveFocusHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void MoveFocusHandler(object o, MoveFocusArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed MoveFocusHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Events using this type were replaced by Gtk.Widget keybinding signal")

remarks.para: The following events utilize this delegate:
Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the MoveFocusHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the MoveFocusHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the MoveFocusHandler is removed from the event.
